name: CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo
desc: The criteria to use when searching for discoverable iCloud users.

items.name: init(emailAddress: String)
items.desc: Creates a lookup info for the specified email address.

items.name: init(phoneNumber: String)
items.desc: Creates a lookup info for the specified phone number.

items.name: init(userRecordID: CKRecord.ID)
items.desc: Creates a lookup info for the specified user record ID.

items.name: class func lookupInfos(withEmails: [String]) -> [CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo]
items.desc: Returns an array of lookup infos for the specifed email addresses.

items.name: class func lookupInfos(withPhoneNumbers: [String]) -> [CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo]
items.desc: Returns an array of lookup infos for the specifed phone numbers.

items.name: class func lookupInfos(with: [CKRecord.ID]) -> [CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo]
items.desc: Returns an array of lookup infos for the specifed user record IDs.

items.name: var userRecordID: CKRecord.ID?
items.desc: The ID of the user record.
